tag_list: richard, jacksonville, accountant, tax, business, tax-planning, estate-taxation
overview: Richard N Camp have more than 20 years of experience with income tax preparation for individuals, partnerships, trusts, estates, providing IRS and state tax representation for businesses. He started the CPA firm in 1990 and relocated to Jacksonville, Florida in 1991. His firm mainly focus on tax planning to professional businesses and even professional individuals. Serving to start-up business and mature businesses around Jacksonville.
